Description_lang: Creates a ball of frost that shatters after a short time, inflicting $s1 Frost damage immediately, $s2 Frost damage every $t2 sec. for $d, and gradually slowing affected targets over $d until they come to a complete stop, at which point they Shatter.
AuraDescription_lang: $s2 Frost damage inflicted every $t2 sec.Movement speed reduced by $w3%.Will shatter at end of effect.
